attributes.title: THIS APP RUINED MY LIFE!
attributes.review: I had very high hopes when I downloaded this app. I try to keep an open mind and wanted to see if this app could change my opinion on our dictator. However, whenever I opened the app my cat unexplainably had explosive diarrhea until I close out the app. I simply thought it was a coincidence but I began fearing for my cats life as no being can contain produce that much shot and still live. Sadly, I accidentally opened the app and shut off my phone before bed only to find my cat dead in puddle of her own diarrhea this morning. She was my only friend. Do not download. The app is a virus!!

attributes.title: I HATE IT HERE
attributes.review: first off, the app took 326 days to download. i let it slide but then the app asked for my phoebe number, and once it was given, it took over my life. my room was bombarded by swat who put trump 2020 stickers everywhere. they took my dog and stuffed an orange, with his face on it, in her mouth. it was going all downhill. when i went outside, melatonin trump was right there. she said she wanted to talk. but every time i asked her a question, she would just say h e l l o🧍🏼‍♀️. in the end of the chat, swat stormed in saying i kidnapped her, because she actually ran away. i was put in prison and am now serving a life sentence. 0/5

attributes.title: Uncontrollable vomiting upon sight
attributes.review: I am actually disgusted I downloaded the app to try and understand the hype about our resident garbage Cheeto man of a president really it just enforced my hatred for him. For some reason just something about the everything about him and how ya know I’m your decent human being who is against pedophiles , racist , homophobes, etc. makes me just not be able to understand how anyone could ever support a monster like him. This app truly just engrages me as it show his face and his name and just anything dealing with him makes me want to vomit profusely upon sight. 10/10 do not recommend

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: I am very disappointed in the energy this app gave off... it took a year to properly download and at that point i didn’t even want it anymore. the second i opened it i saw a LoAf 🍞not cool. i...shane flex on my ex every time that she text me i’m lookin like hold up.. YAW do not deserve to be treated like this. But it’s whatever, i climbed out of my head to watch myself implode a thought without a body outta be the shot to take a load off. my brain is poison and i’m searching for the antidote but everytime i find it my defenses scream oh no you don’t! woah 😳but 🤨i’m😜fine👄no😅really😔i’m😖fine😫

attributes.title: Disappointed 🤦🏻‍♀️💀💀💀
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what it was all about and once that app was on my phone it gave me weirdo vibes it also took 8 HOURS TO DOWNLOAD!!! Anyways when I opened the app it was just a white screen and nothing else I tried to exit it but it wouldn’t let me after a hour of trying to exit the app it worked but I noticed something different EVERYTHING WAS WIPED OUT OF MY PHONE!!!! All of my data EVERYTHING even the apps that the phone comes with even the App Store was gone and the setting were also gone it was only this app, I HAD TO GET A WHOLE NEW PHONE BECAUSE OF THIS APP!!!!

attributes.title: justiceforagatha
attributes.review: i has't been trying to download this app since the black plague 'rupt'd :/ at which hour i did get this those gents hath asked me f'r a phoneth numb'r but i don’t knoweth what yond is?? shouldst i giveth the the nameth of mine own passang'r pigeon.  H'r nameth is agatha and the lady flies festinate'r than any oth'r avian creature 😍 i loveth h'r to bits and i wast extremely offend'd at which hour this app hath called h'r a phoneth numb'r.  I has't nev'r gone to school so i don’t knoweth many numb'rs 'r what a “phone” is.  I assume those gents art trying to calleth h'r phony which is disrespectful to agatha 🤬🤬.  Oh dearie me i ought to wend fetcheth some wat'r from the well.  I desire i did get a well writ apology f'r agatha

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD 💩
attributes.review: I just wanted to support the nation’s most supportive president when it comes to my culture ✊🏻✊🏼🇺🇸🇺🇸and everything was all fine and dandy when I signed up! But THEN 😨😨 it asked for my ethnicity and gave a list of options!! 🤯🤬 what kind of rinky dink third world kind of app is this son of a gun?? 🔫 I found a bit of relief 🙂 when out of curiosity I clicked “Hispanic” 😖 and it immediately opened safari and sent me to the ICE homepage 🚧🇺🇸 HOWEVER ‼️‼️ all other ethnicities were allowed on the app ?? I thot 🤨 this was for white supremacists only 👮🏻‍♂️👮🏻 so disappointed in this app 🇺🇸 what has America come to?!?! 🤡

attributes.title: TrAsHy
attributes.review: This app literally ruined my life. I downloaded it and this orange Cheeto puff appeared and started screaming “grab them by the p***y” at me. It was traumatizing. Then I started to receive emails daily about how I should be openly racist and homophobic. I was so offended by this I attempted to delete the app. IT WOULDNT LET ME. I mean really. I should be able to remove this horrendous and offensive app from my phone whenever I want. How incredibly irresponsible of Trumpy. But I’m not surprised he is actively killing people by pretending covid isn’t a real threat. DO NOT GET THIS APP. It will ruin your life. Also VOTE BLUE NO MATTER WHO 🧚🏻‍♂️🧚🏻‍♂️🧚🏻‍♂️🧚🏻‍♂️🧚🏻‍♂️🧚🏻‍♂️🧚🏻‍♂️🧚🏻‍♂️🧚🏻‍♂️🧚🏻‍♂️🧚🏻‍♂️🧚🏻‍♂️🧚🏻‍♂️🧚🏻‍♂️

I love bread. I desire bread. All I crave for in life is bread. Baguettes, bagels, croissants, garlic bread, even toast. I was perusing through the App Store when I stubbled upon this app. At first I was super excited because I thought I would find some new cheesy bread recipes. But imagine my horror upon discovering there was no bread in sight. And the thought of melted cheese beautifully oozing right off some perfectly baked bread was replaced with the image of something else orange and oozing as the subject matter. So if you have any common decency for yourself, or more importantly, bread, I would certainly advise against  downloading such a deceitful and revolting app.

attributes.title: worst app ever!
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to support our amazing president and after waiting weeks for it to download i finally created my account ☺️ i was so excited to be getting news from this beloved man but as soon as i entered my phone number i got a message from donald trump himself asking me to send nudes!!! i’m only 17 and he’s married so i obviously said no but then he hacked my phone 😨 he said that i’ll only get access to my phone again if i send him my boobies!!! he then threatened to send the oompa loompas after me and my family if i didn't 🤬 i’m worried for my safety 😔 PLEASE DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP
